TopicTitle: How to switch start date for BepiColombo mission?

Articles.Content:
How to switch start date for BepiColombo mission?
Hi, I was playing the first NSA campaign. I'm stucked on very beginning. It's explicitely saying, that I should start on year 290 day 190 to be able to use Venus for kickup. I don't now how to change this time. It's ingame year 56 day 123 when you start mission. It would take decades even with max warp. I'm confused when to start and how to switch ingame time without necessity to wait hours in front of computer. Thanks.
Edited April 20, 2021 by Mikuku

1 hour ago, Mikuku said:
How to switch start date for BepiColombo mission?
Hi, I was playing the first NSA campaign. I'm stucked on very beginning. It's explicitely saying, that I should start on year 290 day 190 to be able to use Venus for kickup. I don't now how to change this time. It's ingame year 56 day 123 when you start mission. It would take decades even with max warp. I'm confused when to start and how to switch ingame time without necessity to wait hours in front of computer. Thanks.

Problem Solved. I have in Settings set using Earth Time (24/7) therefore I started campaign in year 56 (which is then probably equivalent of  suggested starting Kerbin year). If I switch in Settings to use Kerbin time instead, I'm starting in year 190. Heureka.

Edited April 20, 2021 by Mikuku
